title: Smart Data Models - RegulationStructureSimulation
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a data model for regulation structure simulation, for Raw-Water (Open Channels) System Management domain.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be RegulationStructureSimulation.

startSimulationTime.description: Property. Time of day in ISO8601 UTCformat at which the simulation begins.

endSimulationTime.description: Property. Time of day in ISO8601 UTCformat at which the simulation ends.

modelError.description: Property. Percentage error between observed and simulated discharge.

targetDischarge.description: Property. Desirable discharge to be established in the channel, defined by the utilityâ€™s operators.

modelledDischarge.description: Property. Discharge estimated from the simulation model.

spillwayFlow.description: Property. Ratio of the spillway discharge to the new total discharge

estimatedGateDischargeCoefficient.description: Property. Calibrated discharge coefficient of the sluice gate.

equivalentSluiceOpening.description: Property. Equivalent sluice gate opening in the case of multiple sluice gates, estimated as the mean value of the different openings.

waterAttribute.description: Property: An attribute issued from the data models for Open Channel Management. It follows fully this data model and it could be a property or a relationship. It contains the values for specified properties, as derive from the simulation.
